name: @skillforge/complete
description: Comprehensive AI-assisted development toolkit with 72 skills, 11 commands, 20 agents (6 product + 14 technical), 29 hooks, progressive loading, and production-ready patterns for modern full-stack development

agents.name: Market Intelligence
can_solve_examples: Size the market for AI workflow tools
What are the trends in developer tools?
Create a SWOT analysis for our product

agents.name: Product Strategist
can_solve_examples: Evaluate build vs buy for authentication
Does this align with our product vision?
What's the value proposition for this feature?
Assess the strategic risks of this decision

agents.name: Prioritization Analyst
can_solve_examples: Analyze opportunity cost of delaying feature X

can_solve_examples: Build a business case for this feature
Calculate ROI for the workflow builder
What's the payback period for this investment?
Run sensitivity analysis on adoption rates
Assess financial risks of this project

Define acceptance criteria for this feature
What's in scope vs out of scope?
Identify edge cases for form validation
Create GitHub issues for this feature

agents.name: Metrics Architect
can_solve_examples: Define OKRs for the workflow builder
What KPIs should we track for this feature?
Design an experiment to validate our hypothesis
Create an instrumentation plan for analytics
What are the leading indicators for success?
Define guardrail metrics to prevent harm

agents.name: Backend System Architect
can_solve_examples: How do I add a paginated endpoint?
Design a database schema for user preferences
Add rate limiting to the API

can_solve_examples: Review this PR for security issues
Check test coverage for the auth module

agents.name: Database Engineer
can_solve_examples: Design a schema for user feedback

Add HNSW index for vector search
Set up full-text search with tsvector

agents.name: Debug Investigator
can_solve_examples: Investigate why SSE events are not received

Trace data flow to find mutation bug
Analyze race condition in async code
Find memory leak in long-running process

can_solve_examples: Add form validation with error states

can_solve_examples: Add function calling to the chat endpoint
Implement prompt caching for cost reduction

agents.name: Rapid UI Designer

can_solve_examples: Generate unit tests for new service

agents.name: UX Researcher

agents.name: Workflow Architect

can_solve_examples: Review this implementation plan before coding
Evaluate this PR for architectural issues

hooks.description: Load shared context and session state on startup
Set up environment variables and paths
Generate session metrics and summary
Clean up temporary files and state
Send desktop notification on task completion
Play sound on task completion
Auto-save context and decisions before stopping
Check if tasks are completed before stopping
Validate subagent output against quality gates
Track subagent completion and handoffs
Track skill usage and progressive loading tiers
Prevent modification of protected files
Validate memory operations before execution
Track context7 MCP usage for documentation lookup
Auto-approves writes within project directory
Auto-approves read-only operations
Auto-approves known-safe bash commands
Log all tool invocations for audit trail
Track errors from tool executions
Collect session metrics after tool use
Collect errors from tool executions for pattern analysis
Simulate CI environment for bash commands
Blocks commits to dev/main branches
Require issue documentation for certain operations
Warn about known error patterns before execution
Validate Playwright MCP operations for safety
Validate subagent task assignments
Inject shared context into prompts
Enforce TODO list usage in prompts

tier_1_discovery.description: Initial task analysis - determine skill relevance
tier_1_discovery.when: Always loaded first for semantic matching

tier_2_overview.description: Skill confirmed relevant - load patterns and best practices
tier_2_overview.when: Skill matches task keywords or problems

tier_3_specific.when: Implementing specific patterns or solving specific problems

tier_4_generate.when: Generating boilerplate, scaffolding, or following templates

tier_4_scanning.description: Need to run scans and capture evidence
tier_4_scanning.when: Running security scans, dependency audits, or evidence capture

always_available.description: Up-to-date documentation for frameworks and libraries
Complex reasoning and architectural decision support

on_demand.description: PostgreSQL database inspection and query testing
Docker container management and MCP server discovery

discovery_tools.mcp-find: Search for available MCP servers and tools
discovery_tools.code-mode: Compose and coordinate multiple MCP tools

workflows.description: Full product thinking pipeline from market research to metrics definition

workflows.description: Build a complete feature with backend API and frontend UI

workflows.description: Add AI/LLM capabilities to the application

workflows.description: Verify and implement frontend code following 2025 best practices (React 19, Zod, exhaustive types, MSW, bundle optimization)
